xwikidoc.title: $services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.title', [$doc.space])
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #if ("$!request.confirm" == "true" && "$!request.classname" != "") #set($spaceToDelete = $doc.space) #if ("$!request.dataspace" != '') #set($spaceToDelete = "$request.dataspace") #end #set($result = $services.batchimport.deleteExistingDocuments("$!request.classname", "", $spaceToDelete, "i18n")) #if ($result) {{info}}**$services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.success')** $result.fullLog{{/info}} {{html}}$services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.success.backtowebhome', [$doc.space]){{/html}} #else #set($exception = $services.batchimport.exceptionFromContext) #if ($exception) {{error}}**$services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.error.exception')** [$exception.class.name] $exception.message #foreach($elt in $exception.stackTrace) at $elt #end {{/error}} #else {{error}} $services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.error.noexception') {{/error}} #end {{html}}$services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.error.backtowebhome', [$doc.space]){{/html}} #end #else #set($spaceHome = $xwiki.getDocument($doc.space, 'WebHome')) #set($livetableObjInWebHome = $spaceHome.getObject('AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass')) #set($classDocument = $livetableObjInWebHome.getProperty('class').value) #set($dataSpace = "$doc.space$!{livetableObjInWebHome.getProperty('dataSpace').value}") #if ("$!classDocument" != "") {{info}}$services.localization.render('batchimport.delete.confirmation.description', [$doc.space]){{/info}} {{html}}
